website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you need a casket that comes at a reasonable price point and want a design for your loved one that has a bold color and an elaborate look.
pros: Provides a dignified appearance, with black and silver and intricate details
Has a velvet interior with pillow and throw
One of the more affordable options by the brand
cons: Color and trim probably won't work if you prefer a more neutral or feminine option

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased when my mom passed. It was absolutely beautiful. We recieved it in perfect condition. I could not have been more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t heard a single peep from grandma since she received this
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: No oxygen or air vents to breathe!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been dieing to get one and loved it. So comfy i cant seem to arise from my deep sleep. So peaceful though.
customer_reviews.author: Sleazy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. However, I’d like to buy a used one.
customer_reviews.author: christian williams

customer_reviews.title: Liking
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I think my uncle liked it but he was dead so couldn’t feel anything
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this item, it was very uncomfortable while laying in it at my funeral and everyone one could hear me moving around and I got caught red handed.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great for being dead in
customer_reviews.text: I picked this one after I died because it looked comfy. It’s super comfy and I can finally get a good nights rest being dead in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa has been complaining
customer_reviews.text: Old Gramps said it's very uncomfortable can't get him to stop appearing in my room always scaring me appears in the corner because he's a gost but he has dementia he so he doesn't know that any who he also says it's hot down there but everyone at his funeral said he was in heaven fly high oh wait no I mean uh stay low
customer_reviews.author: Gostly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for exes
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my ex. He hasn’t complained yet so it must be pretty good quality
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Compact ability
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one for Nesa! My best purchase yet she saids it’s very comfortable! Love the red velour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was occupied when we got it
customer_reviews.text: When we opened it a black figure flew out and bolted out the window like a deatheater. It had a sinister laugh as it flew off into the night. But if that wasn’t enough, when we put my uncle inside it got real weird. Now, he was a sinner. He’d drop a stinky land mine in the women’s restroom just to make them even. He’d fire paintballs at people digging through our recycling. Point is, I can’t say if it was the coffin caused it, but it’s awfully suspicuous that he burst into flames when we closed the lid. 5 stars cause it cremated him for free and we got our deposit back on the burial.
customer_reviews.author: Shaherb

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My mom got this for me for Christmas and DAMNis it comfy! I can’t wait to die and spend the rest of my physical eternity in this sexy box. Thanks ma!
customer_reviews.author: jhsissonII

customer_reviews.title: Sis loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality sister loves it so much that she’s turned purple
customer_reviews.author: T. Allen

product_meta.title: Overnight Caskets - Knight Black Brush with Velvet Interior - 18 Gauge Metal Casket/Coffin - 1-3 Day Shipping
product_meta.description: This product is as shown in the images. Due to the sensitive and urgent nature of casket delivery, we highly recommend you contact us before purchasing to assure timely delivery to the funeral home of your choice. Please message us with ANY questions. We will answer immediately. We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. With our numerous warehouses across the United States, we are able to offer 1 day shipping to 80% of the USA. Federal Law : Funeral Homes Must Accept our Caskets | Local Warehouse – White Glove Delivery to the Funeral Home of Your Choice. | Same Day And Next Day Delivery Guaranteed. | Save $3000-$5000 On Funeral Costs. | Funeral Assistance. Allow us to Help! | IMPORTANT : Make sure to receive an itemized price list from the funeral home prior to notifying them of your intentions of purchasing a casket elsewhere. This will greatly reduce the chances of a funeral home increasing their prices for other services to make up for the lost profit on the casket. We are here to help 24 hours.
feature_bullets: 1-2 Day Shipping Available to 80% of the USA. Contact us for more information. Must Be Shipped to Commercial Address/Funeral Home.
Beautiful Black Finish With Silver Highlights, White Velvet Interior in a French Fold Design, 18 Gauge Steel, Full Rubber Gasket Sealer, Swing Bar Handle Hardware, Locking Mechanism
Half Couch, Matching Pillow and Throw, Adjustable Eternal Rest Bed (Both Head and Foot), Squared Corners
Silver Jewel-Toned Accessories , Continuous Welded Construction Completely Sealing The Bottom, Memory and Record Tube, Fits In Standard Burial Vaults
